thread.title: Jon
thread.title_full: Official Car Mats reviewed by Jon

author: Jon
title: Jon
text: I originally ordered a full set of matts for a Golf Plus 2015. On receipt they were the wrong size (described as Golf Plus 2007 onwards on the website). However, the issue was found to be related to a wrong pattern on their computer system. On measuring and sending them the correct clip positons they sent me the correct set (actually the same as a Passat?!) The response to the original complaint was very fast and turnaround less than a week. Recommended due to this excellent customer service and good quality product üëåüèº
